identity.name: The Nexus Intelligent Hub
identity.description: A productivity dashboard that feels like a living organism. Dark void backgrounds pierced by neon pulse lines and crystal-clear glass interfaces.

strategies.card_depth: bg-gradient-to-br from-white/5 to-white/0 border-t border-l border-white/10 shadow-lg

buttons.primary: rounded-full bg-primary text-black font-bold px-6 py-2 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(57,255,20,0.4)] transition-all
buttons.glass: rounded-full bg-white/5 border border-white/10 hover:bg-white/10 text-white backdrop-blur-md transition-all

inputs.base: bg-black/20 border-white/10 rounded-xl focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 placeholder:text-white/20

navigation.dock: fixed bottom-8 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 flex items-center gap-4 p-3 rounded-2xl bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-2xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl z-50
navigation.dock_item: w-12 h-12 rounded-xl flex items-center justify-center text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/10 hover:scale-110 transition-all cursor-pointer relative

cards.base: rounded-3xl p-6 glass-panel relative overflow-hidden group
cards.title: text-lg font-medium text-white flex items-center gap-2

icons.instructions: Use Lucide React icons for all UI elements. Use thick stroke (2px) for a bold look.

specific_instructions: CRITICAL: Background MUST be a dark, fixed container with moving radial gradients. Do NOT use a solid color. Create a 'MeshGradient' component.
CRITICAL: Navigation MUST be a floating dock at the bottom of the screen. Do NOT place main navigation in a top sidebar.
CRITICAL: Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. It defines the Cyber look.
CRITICAL: Task Manager must support drag-and-drop reordering (use @dnd-kit/core or similar).
CRITICAL: The 'Architect' (AI) module should feel like a chat interface or a suggestion feed, distinct from other cards.
CRITICAL: Implement circular progress rings for Vitality/Wellness using SVG circles with 'stroke-dasharray'.
CRITICAL: All interactive elements must have 'data-testid' attributes.
CRITICAL: Ensure strict separation of 'Marketing' visuals and 'Dashboard' utility. This is a functional dashboard, so maintain high contrast for text.
CRITICAL: For the 'Vitality' module, use the 'Electric Purple' accent color to differentiate it from the 'Tasks' (Green).
